com.gmail.etordera.jcms

Class IccTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.etordera.jcms.IccTransformer

  • public class IccTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    An IccTransformer performs ICC color transformation on images.

    This class uses native LittleCMS C library for managing ICC color transformations, and may allocate resources that will not be automatically freed by JVM's garbage collection. It is mandatory to call dispose() method on any IccTransformer object when it is no longer needed in order to free all native resources and avoid memory leaks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates an IccTransformer object that will perform color transformations to a predefined destination profile.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IccTransformer

        public IccTransformer(java.awt.color.ICC_Profile destinationProfile,
              int intent,
              boolean blackPointCompensation)
               throws JCMSException
        Creates an IccTransformer object that will perform color transformations to a predefined destination profile.
        Parameters:
        destinationProfile - Destination ICC profile for color transformations
        intent - Intent for color transformations (JCMS.INTENT_*)
        blackPointCompensation - If true, black point compensation is used for colorimetric relative transformations
        Throws:
        JCMSException - If destination profile contains invalid data

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage transform(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                     java.awt.color.ICC_Profile srcProfile)
                                       throws JCMSException
        Performs color transformation on a BufferedImage.
        Destination profile, intent and flags should have been set previously.
        Parameters:
        image - Original image to be transformed
        srcProfile - Source ICC profile of the image
        Returns:
        Transformed image
        Throws:
        JCMSException - if any error occurs during color transformation

      • transform

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage transform(java.io.File srcImage)
                                       throws JCMSException
        Performs color transformaton on an image file. Transformed image is returned as a new BufferedImage.
        Destination profile, intent and flags should have been set previously
        Parameters:
        srcImage - Source image file
        Returns:
        the color transformed image
        Throws:
        JCMSException - if any error occurs during color transformation

      • transform

        public void transform(java.io.File srcImage,
             java.io.File dstImage)
               throws JCMSException
        Performs color transformaton on an image file. Transformed image is saved to another (or the same) file.
        Destination profile, intent and flags should have been set previously
        Parameters:
        srcImage - Source image file
        dstImage - Destination image file
        Throws:
        JCMSException - if any error occurs during color transformation

        Throws:

      • setUseEmbeddedProfiles

        public void setUseEmbeddedProfiles(boolean useEmbeddedProfiles)
        Defines if embedded profiles in source files should be used as source profiles for color transformations. If it is set to false, default input profiles are used instead of embedded profiles.
        Parameters:
        useEmbeddedProfiles - true to use embedded profiles, false to force use of default profiles
        See Also:
        setDefaultRGB(ICC_Profile), setDefaultCMYK(ICC_Profile), setDefaultGray(ICC_Profile)

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Frees any native resources allocated by this object.

      • transform

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage transform(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                     IccProfile src,
                                     IccProfile dst,
                                     int intent,
                                     int flags)
                                              throws JCMSException
        Perform ICC color transformation on an image.
        Parameters:
        image - Original image to be color transformed.
        src - Source profile for color transformation.
        dst - Destination profile for color transformation.
        intent - Transformation rendering intent (JCMS.INTENT_*)
        flags - Flags that modify transformation algorithm (JCMS.CMSFLAGS_*)
        Returns:
        Transformed image.
        Throws:
        JCMSException
